new_ios26_h1.message: Discover now the new "Liquid Glass" interface of Safari iOS 26 for even more realistic testing!

new_ios26_h2.message: Available on all versions of iPhone 15 and iPhone 16

new_iphone_14_h1.message: Be the first to use (virtually) the iPhone 14 PRO

new_iphone_17_h1.message:
New!
Test your sites now with the iPhone 17.

new_iphone_17_h2.message: The iPhone 17, iPhone  Air, iPhone 17 PRO & iPhone 17 PRO MAX are available in the simulator.

new_video_feature_h1.message: Discover the new video capture feature now!

new_video_feature_h2.message: Record with better quality, with new options and with a transparent background

notification_update_title_v100_100_100.message:
InformationTouch scroll is not available, but you can show the scrollbar if you don't have a mouse wheel or a trackpad to scroll.

This is an option in the settings at the bottom right 

notification_update_title_v4_10_0.message: Update v4.10.0The iPhone 17, iPhone  Air, iPhone 17 PRO & iPhone 17 PRO MAX are available in the simulator 

notification_update_title_v4_12_0.message: Update v4.12.0New feature in PRO version, screenshot editing. Buttons to draw shapes, add text, etc. 

notification_update_title_v4_14_0.message: Update v4.14.0Discover the new video capture feature now! 

notification_update_title_v4_14_5.message: Update v4.14.5Significant increase in resolution and quality of screenshots 

notification_update_title_v4_6_9.message: Update v4.6.9Theme Theme change is now possible in the settings  at the bottom right

notification_update_title_v4_7_0.message: Update v4.7.0Fix for full page screenshots and addition of a new device.

notification_update_title_v4_8_0.message:
Update v4.8.0Ability to stop a full page capture before reaching the end of the page.
Also added a text field in the settings to modify the URL displayed in the terminal.

notification_update_title_v4_9_1.message: Update v4.9.0Discover now the new Safari iOS 26 interface on iPhone 15 and 16 

notification_update_title_v4_9_3.message: Update v4.9.3Fix for iOS 26 interface with fixed elements at the bottom of the page. The address bar was overlapping the elements.

notification_update_title_vwelcome.message:

other_extensions_color_picker_descriptio.message: This extension allows you to capture any color on the screen.

other_extensions_font_finder_description.message: Identify the font used on any text of a web page with one click.

other_extensions_h1.message: Discover our brand new free extensions

popup_activate_local_files_info.message: This simulator cannot be activated by default on local files (file:///) but you can manually enable the option in Chrome settings.

popup_site_incompatible.message: The simulator cannot be activated on this native page of your browser. Try another tab or browse to a site and then relaunch.

pro_modale_h1_all_formats.message: Convert your video captures to GIF and MP4 formats

pro_modale_h1_limit.message: You have reached the limit of 5 video captures per day

pro_modale_h2.message: Become a PRO and actively contribute to the development of this extension by supporting its developer.

review_h1.message: How would you rate this extension?

review_note_feedback.message: Thank you for your feedback, feel free to send us a message so we can improve this extension.

review_note_store.message: Thank you for your feedback, feel free to add a rating on the Google Store. I would be very grateful ğŸ˜Š

screencast_error.message: An error occurred during recording. {Click here} for a workaround.

screencast_error_media_stream_track_proc.message: Your Chrome version is too old for this feature. Please update Chrome to a version higher than 94.0

screencast_modale_auto_stop_limit_reache.message: Video recordings are limited to 5 minutes in the free version.

screencast_modale_contact.message: Report a bug, suggest an improvement

screencast_modale_download_gif.message: Compatible everywhere, but lower quality (with transparency if option enabled)

screencast_modale_download_mp4.message: Best compatibility with PowerPoint, but no transparency

screencast_modale_download_webm.message: Download in default WEBM format (with transparency if option enabled)

screencast_modale_gif_duration_limit_inf.message: The maximum duration of a GIF is 60 seconds. Beyond that, the file would be too large.

screencast_modale_texte.message: You can download this video in different formats or get a share link.

screencast_onboarding_texte.message: Create a mobile video in GIF format with 1 click (max 20 seconds)

screencast_quality_info_tooltip.message: Video quality affects the bitrate, fps & resolution of the recording. Higher quality will result in a larger file size.

screenshot_modale_download_webp.message: Download as WEBP, compatible almost everywhere and optimized compression (recommended)

screenshot_modale_help.message: To save the image in large format, right-click on it then "Copy image" or "Save".

screenshot_workaround_context_text.message: Due to certain technical limitations, you may receive this error message when taking a screenshot.

screenshot_workaround_solution_text.message: In this case, to start the capture, simply right-click anywhere on the page, choose the 'Mobile Simulator' entry, then 'ğŸ“· Take a screenshot'

settings_batterie_level.message: Battery level in the device header (%)

settings_change_analytics.message: I help the developer of this extension improve their product with Posthog. All data is anonymized.

settings_change_cursor.message: Do not change the cursor style in the webview

settings_device_default_url.message: Change the URL displayed in the terminal

settings_fullscreen.message: Full screen site in the device

settings_hide_header_footer.message: Hide top and bottom elements of the browser in the webview (PWA)

settings_hide_keyboard.message: Do not display the fake keyboard on input field focus

settings_presenter_mode.message: Presentation mode (right menu visible only on hover)

settings_scrollbar_show.message: Show native scrollbar in the device

settings_transparent_background_info.message: This option involves more calculations and therefore a potential slowdown in display depending on your computer (only compatible with WEBM and GIF formats)
